name: Puzzle Snake
description:
A snake-like puzzle-lite game prototype quickly made to get me out of a funk. Probably won't be completed any further, but is playable in its current state.

Created with HAXE & HEAPS, latest source code available on github or below.

How to Play
  • Eat food to get points, and get bigger.
  • Match 3 to build a wall and increase your multiplier!
  • Eat circle food to get a chance to eat walls, greatly increasing your score.
  • Build combos by eating one wall right after another.
  • Play with 1 to 6 colors for added difficulty.
  • The game speed gradually increases, while eating and making walls causes it to decrease.
Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Enter/Return and Escape for menu navigation
